name: Job Blitz Feed
author: A FitGeek

sections.description:
This feed converts your html comment tag into an iframe and loads information from job-blitz.com.

You may want to set the height and width of the feed example:

[job-blitz height=500 width=300]
sections.installation:
1. Upload job-blitz-feed.php to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Place [job-blitz] in your templates, posts or pages

short_description: Job Blitz is easy to use. Simply add [job-blitz] tag wherever you would like the feed to display.
description:
